name: specialist.toml

fields.name: serviceTypes
fields.description: Types of services the specialist can provide

rawContent:
# Specialist Entity
# Care workers providing services

[entity]
id = "specialist"
name = "Specialist"
description = "A care specialist providing services"
table = "specialists"

[[fields]]
name = "id"
type = "string"
format = "uuid"
required = true
unique = true
description = "Unique specialist identifier"

[[fields]]
name = "name"
type = "string"
required = true
description = "Full name"

[[fields]]
name = "phone"
type = "string"
format = "phone"
required = true
unique = true
description = "Phone number"

[[fields]]
name = "email"
type = "string"
format = "email"
required = false
description = "Email address (optional)"

[[fields]]
name = "avatar"
type = "string"
format = "url"
required = false
description = "Profile photo URL"

[[fields]]
name = "serviceTypes"
type = "array"
items = "string"
required = true
description = "Types of services the specialist can provide"

[[fields]]
name = "cities"
type = "array"
items = "string"
required = true
description = "Cities/areas where specialist can work"

[[fields]]
name = "isActive"
type = "boolean"
default = true
required = true
description = "Whether specialist is currently active"

[[fields]]
name = "createdAt"
type = "datetime"
required = true
description = "Account creation timestamp"

[relations]
orders = { entity = "order", type = "one-to-many", mappedBy = "specialistId" }
availabilities = { entity = "availability", type = "one-to-many", mappedBy = "specialistId" }

[implementation]
interface = "SpecialistEntity"
file = "src/prototype/factories/index.ts"
mock = "src/prototype/mocks/specialists.json"
status = "planned"
